statement.p: In 36.36 of the last 44 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{44}}={0.3636}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{44}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3636}\cdot{44}={15.9984}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 44-15.9984=28.0016 We round that as requested to 28.
